General.Name: Chengdu XGimi Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Chengdu Xgimi Technology Co.,Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells multi-functional smart projectors and laser TVs in China. The company provides home, portable, and laser projectors. It also offers accessories, such as portable stands, X-desktop and floor stands, carrying cases, 3D glasses, remote controllers, and power adapters. Chengdu Xgimi Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2013 and is based in Chengdu, China.
